item.title: 米上院議員6人がソーシャルネットワークの透明性を高める超党派法案を再提出、広告ライブラリやコンテンツモデレーションの統計情報などの共有を企業に義務付ける（John Perrino/Tech Policy Press）
item.description:
John Perrino / Tech Policy Press:
Six US senators reintroduce a bipartisan bill to boost social network transparency, requiring companies to share ad libraries, content moderation stats, more  —  John Perrino is a policy analyst at the Stanford Internet Observatory.  —  The Platform Accountability and Transparency Act …

item.title: ウクライナ、2014年からグローブ・アンド・メール紙で働くフォトジャーナリストのメディア資格を更新せず、嘘発見器テストを受けるよう要求（Nathan VanderKlippe/Globe and Mail）
item.description:
Nathan VanderKlippe / Globe and Mail:
Ukraine fails to renew media credentials for a photojournalist who has worked for The Globe and Mail since 2014, after demanding he take a lie detector test  —  The Ukrainian government has failed to renew the media accreditation for a photojournalist who has worked with The Globe and Mail since 2014 …

item.title: [スレッド】インサイダーの労働組合、スト7日目にしてオーナーのアクセル・シュプリンガーと過半数出資のKKRに書簡、経営陣に労働者との交渉を促す (@insiderunion)
item.description:
@insiderunion:
[Thread] Insider's union, on Day Seven of a strike, writes owner Axel Springer and its majority stake owner KKR, urging management to bargain with workers  —  Today, our bargaining committee sent two letters to groups with meaningful influence on Insider: Axel Springer and KKR. We asked them to encourage Insider to give us reasonable counters, a key move toward ending our ULP strike. Here are the letters and their key points: (1/6)

item.title: [スレッド】Morning Consultがニュースルームを "解散 "し、アナリストチームをより重視する。
item.description:
Jeremy Barr / @jeremymbarr:
[Thread] Morning Consult is “dissolving” its newsroom and putting more emphasis on its analyst team; the changes will impact 2.4% of the company's employees  —  Some news: I've learned that @MorningConsult is “dissolving” their small newsroom, and will be putting more emphasis on the company's analyst team. About 7 people from the newsroom will be laid off, and then 8 will be given a chance to transition from journalists to analyst team

item.title: クリス・リヒトのCNN在任期間は、絶望的ではあったが、デジタルへの移行に希望を与えるCNN+を維持していれば、違った結果になったかもしれない（Alex Sherman/CNBC)
item.description:
Alex Sherman / CNBC:
Chris Licht's CNN tenure could have turned out differently if he kept CNN+, which was likely doomed but represented hope for the network's transition to digital  —  - CNN is seeking a new CEO after Chris Licht left the company following a series of missteps.

item.title: 手紙：LAタイムズギルドによると、組合はワークシェアリングプランのようなレイオフの代替案を検討しただろうが、経営陣は「警告も議論もなかった」（LAタイムズギルド）。
item.description:
L.A. Times Guild:
Letter: the LA Times Guild says the union would have considered layoff alternatives, like a work-sharing plan, but management offered “no warning or discussion”  —  Since the Los Angeles Times Guild started negotiating our new contract in September, our bargaining committee has met …

item.title: Netflixが「House of Cards」をリリースしたことで始まった「Peak TV」の終焉と、より幅広い魅力を持つテレビ番組の復活の可能性について、ハリウッドのインサイダーが考察する（Vulture）。
item.description:
Vulture:
Hollywood insiders reflect on the end of “Peak TV”, kickstarted by Netflix releasing House of Cards, and the possible return of TV shows with broader appeal  —  If you call a slew of Hollywood's most powerful showrunners, studio chiefs, agents, and operators and ask them to describe …

item.title: クリス・リヒトの退社により、米国の主要な報道機関はすべて女性が率いることになった：CNN、ABCニュース、MSNBC、NBCニュース、CBSニュース、Foxニュース、NYT、WaPo、Reuters、WSJ（Jane Thier/Fortune)
item.description:
Jane Thier / Fortune:
Chris Licht's exit means all major US news organization are now led by women: CNN, ABC News, MSNBC, NBC News, CBS News, Fox News, NYT, WaPo, Reuters, and WSJ  —  IA DIPASUPIL/GETTY IMAGES FOR NEW YORK MAGAZINE  —  CNN announced on Wednesday that its chairman and CEO Chris Licht is leaving …

item.title: Googleは、2020年10月に初めて発表したNews Showcaseを、5つのローカルニュース協会との提携とともに、今年の夏以降に米国で開始する予定です（William Turvill/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
William Turvill / Press Gazette:
Google plans to launch News Showcase, first announced in October 2020, in the US later this summer, alongside partnerships with five local news associations  —  Partner publications include the Wall Street Journal, AP, Reuters and Bloomberg.  —  Google will launch the US edition …

item.title: ニューヨークの刑務所を運営する機関が、収監中の作家、ジャーナリスト、アーティストが許可なく出版することを制限していた規則を取り消す（Chris Gelardi/New York Focus)
item.description:
Chris Gelardi / New York Focus:
The agency that runs New York's prisons rescinds its rules that restricted incarcerated writers, journalists, and artists from publishing without permission  —  The policy and its sudden reversal will be among Acting Commissioner Anthony Annucci's last acts.  —  STAY FOCUSED  —  Submit

item.title: G/O、ベテラン技術ジャーナリストDan AckermanをGizmodoのEICに指名、Ackermanは直近ではCNETの編集ディレクターだった（Chris Roush/Talking Biz News）。
item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
G/O names veteran tech journalist Dan Ackerman as EIC of Gizmodo; Ackerman was most recently the editorial director at CNET  —  Veteran technology journalist Dan Ackerman has been hired as editor in chief of tech news site Gizmodo.  —  Ackerman comes to Gizmodo from consumer technology publication CNET …

item.title: 分析：2023年1月から4月までのCNNへの広告主の消費額は$513Mから前年同期比39%減、広告主数は2,700から2,100へ前年同期比23%減（Loree Seitz/The Wrap）。
item.description:
Loree Seitz / The Wrap:
Analysis: advertisers spent $313M on CNN from January to April 2023, down 39% YoY from $513M, while the number of advertisers fell 23% YoY from 2,700 to 2,100  —  The number of advertisers on the network also dropped 23% from the first four months of 2022  —  CNN's ad revenue fell nearly 40% year …

item.title: 宗教ブロードキャスターで、テレビ番組「The 700 Club」の司会者、世界的なキリスト教放送ネットワークの創設者であるパット・ロバートソンが93歳で死去した（Ben Finley/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Ben Finley / Associated Press:
Pat Robertson, a religious broadcaster, the host of The 700 Club television show, and the founder of the global Christian Broadcasting Network, dies at 93  —  Pat Robertson, a religious broadcaster who turned a tiny Virginia station into the global Christian Broadcasting Network …

item.title: TVBの分析：ローカル放送のニュース番組が生み出す1日のインプレッションは、主要なストリーミングサービス6社の番組の8倍から12倍を上回る（Karlene Lukovitz/MediaPost)
item.description:
Karlene Lukovitz / MediaPost:
TVB analysis: daily impressions generated by local broadcast news programming exceed those of programs on six leading streaming services by between 8x and 12x  —  Daily impressions generated by local broadcast news programming exceed those of programs on six leading streaming services …

item.title: ユニバーサルは、プレミアムVODは、チケットの売上を減少させることなく、3年未満で10億ドル以上の収益を生み出し、「非常にポジティブ」なビジネスインパクトをもたらしたと述べている（Brooks Barnes/New York Times)
item.description:
Brooks Barnes / New York Times:
Universal says premium VOD has had a “hugely positive” business impact, generating $1B+ in revenue in less than three years, without decreasing ticket sales  —  The studio let viewers rent or buy movies earlier for a higher price.  This made more than $1 billion in less than three years …
